abstract: With 57 deals under its belt this year, Google has already smashed its record of 48 acquisitions in 2010.
snippet: With 57 deals under its belt this year, Google has already smashed its record of 48 acquisitions in 2010.
lead_paragraph: With 57 completed deals under its belt this year, Google has already smashed its 2010 record of 48 acquisitions -- and it is only October.

headline.main: For Google, a New High in Deal-Making
